com.enremmeta.rtb.config

Class PacingServiceConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.enremmeta.rtb.config.PacingServiceConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Config, Jsonable, Serializable

    public class PacingServiceConfig
extends Object
implements Config
    Config for pacing service. For actual information on the pacing algorithms, see AdCache.
    Author:
    Gregory Golberg (grisha@alum.mit.edu) Copyright Â© Enremmeta LLC 2014. All Rights Reserved.
    See Also:

      • BUDGET_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_NAIVE

        public static final String BUDGET_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_NAIVE
        This strategy will allocate money to a current Ad as follows:
        1. Figure out how many refresh periods there are between now and end of Ad's flight.
        2. Divide total remaining budget in the pacing cache by this number, and also by the number of number of servers servicing this bid stream.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BUDGET_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_WIN_RATE_BASED

        public static final String BUDGET_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_WIN_RATE_BASED
        This strategy will allocate the budget as BUDGET_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_NAIVE first, and then calculate the win rate (wins/bids) and divide the budget by the win rate. In other words, if the naive strategy resulted in allocation of micro$ 10000 and the win rate is 20% (0.2), the new budget will be adjusted to 50000.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_BUDGET_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY

        public static final String DEFAULT_BUDGET_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY
        See Also:

      • getBudgetAllocationStrategy

        public String getBudgetAllocationStrategy()
        How to allocated money from budget. Possible choices are:
        1. naive
        2. winRateBased

        NOTE: This applies to allocating new money from the budget, and does not apply to what to do with money allocated previously that was unspent. For that, see getBudgetAllocationStrategy().

      • setBudgetAllocationStrategy

        public void setBudgetAllocationStrategy(String budgetAllocationStrategy)
